skill_constraints: Key-person dependencies in Backend and DevOps roles.
resource_bottlenecks: Single developer for backend logic; single developer for all IaC/CI-CD.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive cross-training, pair programming on critical tasks, and detailed documentation.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new developer.
mitigation_strategies: Add a second Senior Backend Developer to parallelize core logic development and eliminate key-person dependency.
